title: India can build a $1.2-trillion bioeconomy by 2047
description: Scaling up. Promoting innovation through capital-market innovation and regulatory modernisation, a la China, is the way to go
content: Indias bioeconomy has expanded 16-fold over the past decade from $10 billion in 2014 to over $165 billion in 2024. With the right policy architecture, it can exceed $1.2 trillion by 2047, becoming a … [+5159 chars]
